data.message: Many would like a way too have our photos on our page to be private. Once posted on a timeline to be shared with friends we should be able to keep the friends of friends and public out of them. Please come up with a way to make it easy for photos to be made for "only me." Not one at a time. Thanks.

replies.message: Hi Moheuddin. You have the option to change the privacy of your photo albums. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1PR6j0l. Hope this helps. -Jordan
